items.sentence: Why are you here in Boston? You\'re supposed to be in Chicago, aren\'t you?
Tom threw a big party at his house while his parents were away on vacation.
Tom told Mary that they needed to be careful not to wear out their welcome.
Tom could have gone camping with you if you\'d let him know you were going.
Take a step back from the situation and try to figure out what\'s going on.
Tom said the reason he broke up with Mary was that she was very possessive.
I want to know if you\'re planning on going to Boston with us next weekend.
Tom couldn\'t get any work done because his children kept interrupting him.
Just because Tom said he didn\'t do it doesn\'t mean that he didn\'t do it.
Tom\'s girlfriend broke up with him and started going out with another guy.
Tom and I are driving to Boston next weekend. Would you like to go with us?
Tom came up with various ideas on how to make his business more successful.
My family needed money, so I started working when I was thirteen years old.
Now that you know where I live, come and visit whenever you get the chance.
Tom didn't know until today that he was supposed to be in Boston by Monday.
Tom and Mary weren't the only ones crying. Other children were crying, too.
The city became popular thanks to the amusement park constructed last year.
Unless Japan eliminates its unfair tariffs, the U.S. will impose sanctions.
Sorry I haven't fixed dinner tonight. I was so tired there was just no way.
You should let the wine breathe for a couple of minutes before drinking it.
